name: Floor Champion 0(Demo)
description: You play as Dolf a character whos actions are decided by the player in a mysterious world filled with weird creatures and unique people.  Unbeknownst to Dolf, the world that he is in is separated by floors. Every 10 floors has a "Champion "assigned to it to protect the people and  make sure balance on their assigned floor remains peaceful. Dolf plays the role of Champion 0 who has the potential to match all of the champions in strength and be the guardian over all the floors. With his companions that he meets along the way, he will live up to the name  Champion 0!
